name: Faster: HTML Edition
description:
Faster!!! is a game where you seek the thrill of speed, swerving through traffic and avoiding the police. Use power-ups, unlock new exciting cars, and most importantly, enjoy the ride!

Controls:

Use W and S or the arrow keys to switch lanes

Press F to flash other drivers!

Press R to drop oil and make the cops slip on it!

Tip : To escape the cops, try to crash them into another car
